From: Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>

CC: Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>; May Karaki <May.Karaki@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-19 12:28
Subject: Fire Drill - HO1
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,


I wanted to take a moment to thank each and every one of you for your active participation in the fire drill exercise today at HO1. Your prompt response and cooperation ensured that the drill ran smoothly and that we were able to assess our preparedness in a realistic scenario.




Safety is a top priority for all of us, and it’s reassuring to see how well everyone followed the procedures. Your commitment to staying safe and being aware of emergency protocols helps create a safer environment for all of us.




We have gained some good learnings from the exercise today and we will make sure to address these learnings accordingly to ensure continual improvements.

If you have any feedback or suggestions for improvement, please don’t hesitate to share them. Let’s continue to work together to keep our workplace safe and ready for any situation.




Thank you again for your time and effort!




Best regards,

 

RAMI RIMAN​​​​

SENIOR MANAGER ‑ ADMINISTRATION

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000
